## Changes in v1.4.3

### Bug Fixes

- **Update check** â€“ Fixed "Update check failed: Cannot find latest artifacts" (404 on mac.yml).
  - In-app updater now uses an explicit GitHub releases URL so the correct repo is always used.
  - Release workflow now generates and uploads update metadata (e.g. `latest-mac.yml`) so the updater can find the latest version.
